name: Blocks! (itch) (Yashi, Dokomotive, Tilaon, Panda, VuZeRevil)
description:
Blocks! is a 3D game we developed for the htk gamejam.

It is a multiplayer or singleplayer, you can enjoy with your friends via keyboard and controller or parsec.
Pretty pastel colored blocks and a few different levels are waiting for you here and you can just enjoy your time in this brand new game.

Build the higher tower against gravity!
Maybe even make it harder for your opponent?
This game will destroy friendships.

Play local together or online via parsec.

We hope you will have fun and enjoy our game!


Download Instructions:
1.  Download the ZIP
2. Right click and select "Extract All...".
3. Save the files
4.  Start the .exe
5.  Have fun playing!
